dcterms:creator: S. Kottur
S. Moon
A. Geramifard
B. Damavandi
dcterms:description: SIMMC 2.0 aims to create virtual shopping assistants that can accept complex multi-modal inputs, including visual appearances of objects and user utterances. It consists of four subtasks: multi-modal disambiguation, multi-modal coreference resolution, multi-modal dialog state tracking, and response retrieval and generation.
dcterms:title: SIMMC 2.0

dcterms:description: SIMMC 1.0 is a dataset for situated and interactive multimodal conversations, providing a foundation for task-oriented dialog systems in a co-observed VR scene.
dcterms:title: SIMMC 1.0
